name: ExtensionRoleStatus
title: Extension: RoleStatus
description: This extension applies to the PractitionerRole resource and indicates the possible states of the Role, as defined by the HL7v3 Role class state machine.

element.definition: Represents the status of the Role, as defined by the HL7v3 Role class state machine.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is labeled as a modifier because the status code may provide additional knowledge about the PractitionerRole resource that modifies its meaning or interpretation

mapping.comment: Codes representing the defined possible states of the Role

element.short: normal | active | cancelled | pending | suspended | terminated | nullified
element.definition: Code representing the defined possible states of a practitioner
